entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: WSW 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
